verses.text_plain: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.
verses.verse_html: 1If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.

verses.text_plain: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
verses.verse_html: 2Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

verses.text_plain: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
verses.verse_html: 3For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

verses.text_plain: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
verses.verse_html: 4When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.

verses.text_plain: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:
verses.verse_html: 5Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:

verses.text_plain: For which things’ sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:
verses.verse_html: 6For which things’ sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:

verses.text_plain: In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.
verses.verse_html: 7In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.

verses.text_plain: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.
verses.verse_html: 8But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.

verses.text_plain: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;
verses.verse_html: 9Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;

tokens.text: seeing that ye have put off

verses.text_plain: And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:
verses.verse_html: 10And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:

verses.text_plain: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.
verses.verse_html: 11Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.

verses.text_plain: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
verses.verse_html: 12Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;

verses.text_plain: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
verses.verse_html: 13Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

verses.text_plain: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
verses.verse_html: 14And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.

verses.text_plain: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.
verses.verse_html: 15And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.

verses.text_plain: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 16Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

verses.text_plain: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.
verses.verse_html: 17And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.

tokens.strong_raw: G3956 G3739 G5100 G0302 lemma.TR:παν lemma.TR:ο lemma.TR:τι lemma.TR:αν

verses.text_plain: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 18Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.
verses.verse_html: 19Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.

verses.text_plain: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 20Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.
verses.verse_html: 21Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.

verses.text_plain: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:
verses.verse_html: 22Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:

verses.text_plain: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
verses.verse_html: 23And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;

tokens.strong_raw: G3956 G3739 G5100 G1437 lemma.TR:παν lemma.TR:ο lemma.TR:τι lemma.TR:εαν

verses.text_plain: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.
verses.verse_html: 24Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.

verses.text_plain: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
verses.verse_html: 25But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
